snippet: Subway’s investigation included a review of more than a million online comments and interviews with past and present employees and managers of the company and an advertising fund.
lead_paragraph: Subway’s investigation included a review of more than a million online comments and interviews with past and present employees and managers of the company and an advertising fund.

headline.main: Subway Sandwich Chain Uncovers 2011 Complaint About Spokesman
headline.print_headline: Subway Sandwich Chain Uncovers 2011 Complaint About Spokesman
